Text.Page:
met Morick, a baraka studying flying mounts who needed help to complete his research. Morick asked to act as a go-between with Garta, a goblin moneylender to whom he owed a debt.

Garta claimed that Morick failed to pay his debts in time—but agreed to return the collateral if could find his missing pet frog.

Are you ? You have gotten quite the reputation around the camp here.

I wonder if you can help me. You see, I borrowed money some time ago from the Goblin Smugglers' League in order to continue my research.

I finally have the funds to repay my debt, but the moneylender refuses to take it! I gave him some of my notes as collateral, and he believes they are more valuable to him than my money."How can I help?"

I need to get my notes back, but Garta, the moneylender, refuses to even talk to me.

Could you please persuade him to return my research?

Eh? That baraka tells you his story—not whole story!

His debt is long overdue. Papers are mine now!"Can't we compromise...?"

No compromise!

Hm...actually...

There is something more valuable than baraka papers! My frog! Frog disappeared this morning.

You return my frog, I give you papers!

Go look around crystal merchant. Frog likes shiny things.

What? Garta's frog? Yes, I saw it.

It was trying to eat my stock! I'm sure Garta trained it to steal crystals for him.

Anyway, I chased it off, and it went under that big wagon behind my tent. It's probably still there.

Under wagon? Not likely! Frog loves heights.

Here. Use this, you get up there, too!
